task.title: Upload test suites to qTest manually
task.shortdesc: Katalon allows you to upload a test suite or all test suites in a test suite folder to qTest.

step.cmd: Navigate to the Integration tab of the test suite. Click on the New parent button.
step.stepresult: The Create Test Suite's parent dialog opens.

step.cmd: Select a Parent folder, then choose the location to integrate with the Katalon test suite.
In the Creation Options section, select the Create only option.
step.info: This option allows you to create an association between the Katalon test suite and the selected qTest location.

step.cmd: Click OK to continue. Once integrated, you can see the location and the name of the parent folder on qTest.

To upload a test suite manually to the predefined qTest location, navigate to the Integration tab of the test suite. In the List of test suite's parents window, select a qTest location, then click Upload.

image.alt: Upload test suites to qTest manually

step.info: Alternatively, you can also right-click on the test suite to trigger its context menu. Select qTest > Upload.

image.alt: Upload test suites to qTest manually in an alternative way

step.cmd: Optional: You can also manually upload multiple test cases in a a test suite folder to qTest. However, you need to make sure:

li.p: All test suites in the test suite folder have at least one registered qTest location.
At least one test suite in the selected test suites folder has not been uploaded yet.

step.info: To do so, in the Tests Explorer panel, right-click on the test suite folder to trigger its context menu. Select qTest > Upload.

step.cmd: Once the uploading process finishes, click Navigate to go to qTest to verify whether the Katalon test suites are uploaded to the registered qTest locations.
